Pretty good! I found a litter of kittens in my garden this morning.
Five! I'm trying to care for them until I can find them homes.
Oh wow, that's amazing of you! Do you know if their mother is around?
Nope, I haven't seen her around at all.
Okay, so you'll need to bottle feed them then.
It's a lot of work, but so rewarding. What are you feeding them?
I got some special kitten milk replacer from the pet store.
